amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of amendments numbered 9, 16, 18, 20, and 22 contained in House Report 108-751 and printed on pages H8875-H8877 in the Congressional Record for October 8, 2004.
amendment.purpose: An amendment en bloc consisting of amendments number 9, 16, 18, 20, and 22 printed in House Report 108-751.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
